lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our friends at D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now, sorry, quick announcement here, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got an eternal loop going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In fact, some would say I'm a master debater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys can all tune in and watch me master debate Liam O'Brien in front of your own eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So go ahead and tweet your debate questions to @DnDBeyond and make sure to include the hashtag #MasterDebater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you ever master debate backstage of Les Mis?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just wanted to be snug, that's all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When did you start master debating?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I think I really found I had a knack for it around 12 or 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's when I really got into master debating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did anyone teach you how to master debate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I feel like it really changes the game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you go open hand or closed fist?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the longest span of time you've ever master debated?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you know, I'm pretty relaxed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would think with all that master debating, you would be a perfect candidate for filibuster though, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Were you on a master debating team?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Master debating is best when it's one-on-one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My heart rate is up, elevated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt's been blue screening for the last minute and a half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's drawn from all sorts of ancillary realms as well, even Arkhan, the resident dick-bag dragonborn that stole the Hand of Vecna at the end of our last campaign is in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's one of the chromatic, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can keep your champions idle on the go, which is pretty fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an iPhone, that works for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should check it out, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to multi-task for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll have time to squeeze it in? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can join us Saturday, July 20th for our Talks Machina panel at San Diego Comic-Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Includes, pardon me, updates on Handbooker Helper, MAME Drop, Travis Willingham's Yee-Haw Game Ranch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you should, that's a good voice for the show, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the Sheets, and a special Call of Cthulhu one-shot that Taliesin Jaffe here's going to be running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting) [thunder, water bubbling] [explosion] ♪ Role, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn, your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ [fire burning]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Short rest, cast Identify for ten minutes on that fucking dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, look at you, smart guy, what the hell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already put it in the statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know if it's removable or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, what can we see beyond the door? Is it obscured somehow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it just goes into pitch black.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think this could wait, or do we need to know now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm afraid we might not get another opportunity, if you get my drift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you afraid there's something wrong with it? That it's bad news?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it's good news? We could use all the help we can get.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I guess you should check it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is longer than any whip you've seen, and as you crack it, it whirls up and manages to stretch quite a distance before it snaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Identify it, identify it, identify it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it seem like it stretched longer than it actually is when he's holding it at rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I walk away from the door and sit and cross-cross applesauce and begin to identify.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could all do the same, take a short rest, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A short rest takes 30 minutes, you want it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short rest is about an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should post up and look for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The warlock runs out of gas really easy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm good, but you know, if Fjord needs a little resty-poo, we should take one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody else needs one, just me being selfish over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been dinged a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't ever have much, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're like, "Had a good voyage today, can I get a haay?" And all the ships are like, "Haay!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a really unifying thing, you know, union workers and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard them do that in Nicodranas as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but we need to be on guard, on watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's all take a short rest back to back and keep an eye out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good, so I'm going to do some investigating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can find any carvings, any writing, any script on the walls, anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No no, in the angel chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean the space between the barrier and that angel doorway? Okay, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you will, yes, an antechamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any particular symbols or writing that calls your attention within this chamber, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god, what if the wall opened up on the other side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean in the mirror realm?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If nobody else needs a short rest, it might not hurt to go look at all the mirrors either, make sure something hasn't changed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what do the two of you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going back to the mirror room and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And looking and seeing for changes and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You approach the nearest mirror and reach out and it's solid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I couldn't get through before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're maybe the worst people to do this, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just make a once around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to go all around the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe it was active when the knife thing was in the handle and not now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense from watching what had transpired here as well, the mirrors seem to be a one-way activation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And nobody's on the other side now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe somebody should've stayed on the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no reason to go there anymore, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one you always drink from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only flask I ever drink from, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it the one that's got a lot of alcohol, the like endless alcohol in it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you are defined by many other things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you seen it? It's the one that I always have on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've seen it? Where is it, who has it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then you would realize that you didn't need it because you had a clear head and then you would go, "Oh my gosh, thank you so much, Jester, "for taking it from me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't think you could talk to me about that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, at the time you were pretty drunk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but think about how clear we're talking right now, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like we talk like this all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, kind of, but usually like your eyes are going like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, you might be enjoying this conversation but I am not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm sad that you couldn't talk to me about this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll forgive you if you give me back my flask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had to chase after you, you almost died.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whole time we've been coming down here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just want to be on an adventure with you guys and that's all I want and I don't want to think about anything else past that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a husband and a son who loves you very much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just that, you know, they rely on you and we do too and...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't have everyone relying on me, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no, I mean, you can rely on me too and we can rely on Caleb and we can rely on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I want to go back with them so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm worried that if I go back, that'll be it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or even if she's not, we might not ever get out of here and we might not ever get back to Nicodranas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I can start with baby steps and only drink between the hours of like, what do you suggest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe like between the time we camp and like the time we go to sleep only.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not right when you wake up, you know? It's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we find a trap at, like, 1:00?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we could all die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So is Caleb and he's squishy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is, he's very handsome. He shaved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will think about it, I promise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And hey, if, you know, you feel like you really need it or something, just tell me and I can cast, like, a restoration spell on you or something and maybe, you know, you'll feel better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I can get as drunk as I want and then when I want to un-drunk--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not going to waste my spells like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was saying if you have like a hangover or something--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only one way to find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, anyone else doing anything specifically?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep searching for stuff if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what else are you looking for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) I'm supposed to be good at investigating and I suck at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're very good at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you making so much noise over here? What are you looking for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a mechanism? How is it crying? Why is it crying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to investigate the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a strange-- It's a strange thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get a sense of how old these things are? I can't remember if we've done that in the past game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the iconography, the discussion based on the history of Bazzoxan, the conversation with the angel skull, you get the sense this place is Pre-Calamity, as is a lot of things in this area of Xhorhas that haven't been built recently by the Kryn Dynasty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no writing on this door or these bells or musical tone devices?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not specifically in this section, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is everybody? They're all here, you're all here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all still mostly gathered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scratch a little design into my armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I be able to pull it and then yank it towards somebody else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, I'm not really a whip master.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was a good debater in school, but...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really dole out some punishment with that whip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got a nice weight to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you use it with other things, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, like in one hand while you've got a sword?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you've got a two-handed weapon, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I think this has your name all over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How often do you hit things with your handaxe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Might as well have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's more useful than your axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can also be used on objects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To pull objects towards you or you towards objects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could maybe work for you because you do so many things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I'm putting it on my belt right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love it, but this feels like...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything up high that I can hit it with, that I can wrap it around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The longest roll of the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, glancing near the entryway where you guys first came in, there is a faint aspect of an archway where you can see there's a little groove on top and a little space between where some of the stone has fallen away, there's a slight gap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I pull myself up towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you invoke the whip, it seems to retract and like a reverse rubber band, pull you through the air towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can either choose to grab onto it or just fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to grab onto it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a spider on your head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk over and push her by the shoe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else anyone wants to do in this area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Short rest is an hour, so if...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think I got it, but...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say because you were casting a spell, you could take a short rest, but you'd have to wait an additional ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the short rest is complete.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all right? You're staring at the wall a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I just, I'm ready to figure out what this place is and what's going on and just have some answers, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing's familiar at all? Not that it would be, but...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: None of this is familiar to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, you are often on the front line with us, but might I suggest you stick to the middle right now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if I feel comfortable with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little protection is not a terrible thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to be in the front, if that's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So if it's okay with you guys, I would like to be in front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real quick, because we're in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For an hour now, any new tracks in this room that do not belong to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your eyes don't pick up anything one way or the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In case we didn't see them on the way through, just want to make sure no one's in here with us, has gone through, or is behind us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there tracks on in the inside going towards where we're going? Are there footprints already leading down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to make a survival check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to lay out for another ten or 15 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To achieve that short rest like the others did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he can go ahead and recover a little bit of his arcane knowledge.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I see anything looking ahead into the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going from the smooth interior to a constructed interior, but that's the extent of your visual range from where you guys are waiting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I check for tracks going in there as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, everyone's already kind of-- Kind of pushed into the track rolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, any other prep we need to do before we go in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody got any glass vials, beakers, anything like that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we have a thousand ball bearings, don't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but this would make noise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like (crackling) if they stepped on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me see what else I have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So initiative, for next eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take an empty healing bottle, healing potion bottle, and get some of the blood that's dripping and put it in the bottle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have to take some time while you're resting and waiting for Caleb to finish to go ahead and fill some of the vial, but it's doable, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel like there's a thrumming coming from this one, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you feeling for the music, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Connects it to the other ones that you've listened to before, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you ever put your ear to this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put it to the back when we were down there but I want to hear it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it in, it's playing the music again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else you wish to do at this juncture?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the marching order, by the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to be behind Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, get a cleric up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So wait, so Caduceus behind Beau and then Fjord?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no light source down here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott next, and then we have Caleb and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to be in the back or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be in the back, Caleb will be in front of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take a big old fat swig of booze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you continue on towards the end of the hall?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Railings on either side, yeah, it's like a T?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The walls open into this space, like a cavern, or a room ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a railing, like once it opens up, there's a railing across from there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it falls off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anytime there's a walkway and a giant, open chasm, it's bad news bears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where else are we going to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to savor this moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to take this moment to burn a one 1st-level spell slot of transmutation magic, I have Feather Fall prepared just to shift the transmutation stone back to being help with concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see what you would expect to be the radius, once again, also choked by the locale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does a blind human see? I'm just holding onto Nott's shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you see like little flickering candles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What little bit of light that's coming through that's giving off and is being choked is making visible a slight shape in the center of the floor down below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you, since you guys are at the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks kind of like a sarcophagus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of. It kind of looks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pass it down the line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any tracks amongst our feet? Anything fresh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're having a hard time picking up tracks, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, I'm just, you know, if I can, I got to quit shuffling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The scripture at the front said, "Let lie the King's instrument, "deathless and detained, until the world ends."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're going to make it deathful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I can't really see anything yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you send some lights down there? You think that'd be bad idea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we stepped out at least to the railing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys up at the railing now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far down does it go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, in that case, I'll do a ping then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning to the floor and then the actual this stone slab-like structure is maybe, hard to tell from this distance, but about 40 or 50 feet out from where you guys are standing at the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will do Eyes of the Grave, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's just this smooth-- Make a perception check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just barely make out, with what little bit of light there is, there's designs on it, but you can't tell anything from this distance in this low light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I put my hand on the wall, do I feel any kind of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staircases bring you down to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ready to light this room up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can't see anyone else in there, just the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a natural 20 on your perception check and you don't see anybody else in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a swig and go invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out the driftglobe and light it up and say Tawhaj and it floats next to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has three sets of dark chains pulled across it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is talent in this, but it isn't refined.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, the Crawling King.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it look like it's carved into the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, it looks like it's painted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lines are a little rough to give it this weird, violent feel to a still image.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the opposite wall from us, where we are at this railing, is it a matching sort of walkway around or just the stairs that go down to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the walls go straight and then just angle inward and then you see two torches on the opposite end that are just faintly burning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're quite a distance to check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are these chains affixed in here again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three sets of them that cross over from corner to corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over the slab and then a center one there, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where do they come from? Are they coming out of the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like locked in there and bolted.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless the Bright Queen's got a better idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tomorrow, we contact the queen from here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We make a decision after that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Telling her doesn't have to stop us from finding the Kiln.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless they throw us in jail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not if we're not there for them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll take them an awful long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we're in the middle of fucking nowhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we are going to take responsibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can even contact, what's his name, Hot Boi, Essek?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping an ear on the wall just to see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have to go back into the barracks to rest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As far as we can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys trek back to Bazzoxan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll ride back to Bazzoxan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you've been feeling like you've been pushed towards this Kiln? It's what you keep calling it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you feel like it's close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it looked like a salt flat, but it also liked it had, it was white dunes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that sound familiar to anything we've seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know that in the Greying Wildlands, there is a large mountain range called the Flotket Alps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is north of where you live, or where you grew up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like if you mention this to Caduceus, you know exactly what those are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that match what I have in my head or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've not really gone too far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he says white dunes, crystal, there is actually, and you've only read about it and it comes to mind, though you never paid attention much at the time, there is a place called the Crystalsands Tundra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's to the northwest of those alps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And this is the Dunrock Mountains?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have a map for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the north it is above a body of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those mountains at the very, very top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those probably could be the Flotket Alps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a heavy lake, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's what, dunes? Is that land?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll have to figure this out tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not going to think about that now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't, that's the whole point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, that did not go good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am happy to have worn this shirt tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy, oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end tonight's episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's the end of this chapter for Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't forget to love each other.
